name: Ronin Puzzles - Landscape
description:
Awesome free puzzles game with 100 landscapes and 5 difficulty levels for each landscape (35, 70, 140, 280 and 560 pieces).

Ideal for any age range, this game stimulates your intelligence in a fun and efficient way.
Enjoy hours of pure fun and challenges.
There are no hidden fees or paid features inside the game: you can unblock everything without spending a penny.

If you find yourself stuck, you can use the "help" system: through playing the game, you will be able to find the resources to get more "help" items.
